{"id":928759019,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1680739263,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/928759019/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Bits","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    uint32_t reverseBits(uint32_t n) {\n        int result = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < 32; i++) {\n            // Calculate the Least Significant Bit\n            int lsb = n & 1;\n            // Now to reverse the bits:\n            int reverse = lsb << (31 - i);\n            result = result | reverse;\n            // Right shift the original number\n            n = n >> 1;\n        }\n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-bits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
